column4: can anyone direct me to a good resource for updating my repositories in Jaunty including details of fixing public keys?
what's wrong with your public keys?
When add sources to my repo list I get errors with the public keys
Third party sources like openoffice, pidgin etc..
okay, but what did you put in, exactly?
IOW, what deb line(s) did you use?
Sure one sec and i'll tell you...
ok so I just added the repo as seen here http://paste.ubuntu.com/164817/ and I recieved the error as seen here http://paste.ubuntu.com/164818/
it's a package available on the launchpad site that's supposed to cure the problem: https://code.launchpad.net/~mvo/apt/archive-key-signatures
hrm, actually, ubuntu-keyring should have it..
dont know anything about that stuff so I was looking for a good resource to read up and try to solve the problem
might have found the fix... checking
